markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4+"
    pfs=""
>
[Mistform Elixir](/Equipment.aspx?ID=96)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Elixir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=59" />
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Visual" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=163" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 549 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A faint mist emanates from your skin, making you [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) for the listed duration. As usual being concealed when your position is still obvious, you can't use this concealment to [Hide](/Actions.aspx?ID=62) or [Sneak](/Actions.aspx?ID=63).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 4"
pfs="Standard"
>
Mistform Elixir (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 549 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 18 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The duration is 3 rounds.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 6"
pfs="Standard"
>
Mistform Elixir (Moderate)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 549 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 56 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The duration is 1 minute.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 10"
pfs="Standard"
>
Mistform Elixir (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 549 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 180 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The duration is 5 minutes.
name: Mistform Elixir (Moderate)
